cover_concepts.design_approach: Follows proven successful patterns in the genre
cover_concepts.ideogram_prompt: Professional paranormal romance book cover, professional design, featuring paranormal_romance, book title "Blood Moon Rising" prominently displayed, author name "Sara Riouch", commercial book cover design, bestseller aesthetic, high quality typography, genre-appropriate imagery, market-ready design, professional composition, readable at thumbnail size, contemporary design
cover_concepts.rationale: Uses established visual language that readers expect and respond to in this genre

cover_concepts.design_approach: Incorporates Illustrated/cartoon style couples with Abstract geometric designs
cover_concepts.ideogram_prompt: Trendy paranormal romance book cover incorporating Illustrated/cartoon style couples and Abstract geometric designs, modern aesthetic, contemporary color palette, current design trends, book title "Blood Moon Rising" with modern typography, author "Sara Riouch", fresh take on paranormal romance genre, innovative composition, eye-catching design, social media ready, contemporary illustration style, on-trend visual elements
cover_concepts.rationale: Capitalizes on what's currently working while incorporating fresh elements

cover_concepts.design_approach: Deliberately stands apart from common genre clich√©s
cover_concepts.ideogram_prompt: Unique paranormal romance book cover design, avoiding Shirtless male torsos, Clinch covers (traditional embrace poses), distinctive visual approach, unexpected color combinations, non-typical paranormal romance imagery, innovative layout, stands out from competition, book title "Blood Moon Rising" with creative typography, author "Sara Riouch", memorable design, shelf-standout appeal, creative composition, breaks genre conventions while remaining appropriate
cover_concepts.rationale: Designed to stand out on crowded digital shelves by avoiding overused elements

cover_concepts.ideogram_prompt: Premium artistic paranormal romance book cover, sophisticated aesthetic, high-end design, literary quality, custom artistic elements, refined color palette, elegant typography, professional photography or illustration, book title "Blood Moon Rising" with sophisticated font, author "Sara Riouch", gallery-quality composition, premium positioning, artistic flair, sophisticated visual appeal, luxury book design
cover_concepts.rationale: Appeals to readers who value aesthetic quality and positions book as premium offering
